DOC.brief_summary: Subjects randomize 3 treatment group ( 15 subject per group ) : 1 ) Control - receive treatment 2 ) Placebo - receive sham Astym速 treatment 3 ) Astym速 Treatment - receive Astym速 treatment low extremity . Subjects blind whether receive Astym速 treatment placebo treatment intervention . After 5-minute warm-up low body ergometer subject familiarize operation computerize leg press machine measure maximum force output ( Newtons ) unilateral isometric squat test . A baseline measure maximal force output ( pre-test ) determine average 3 trial 30 second rest period trial . The subject receive designated treatment intervention . Immediately follow treatment intervention ( 0 minute follow treatment intervention ) subject retested ( post-test ) use identical testing procedure investigator blind treatment intervention receive subject . Maximum force output measure Newtons post-test subtract maximum force output ( Newtons ) pre-test converted percentage change [ ( post-test - pretest ) /pretest X 100 ) . The percent change maximal force output pre-test post-test measure compare use one-way analysis variance alpha set 0.05 . A Tukey 's post-hoc analysis determine statistical difference group .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Astym Treatment Muscle Performance
DOC.criteria: 1 . Referral physical therapy service student investigator musculoskeletal injury low extremity . 2 . Subjects must age 1865 yearsold 3 . Present 10 % great deficit maximum force output computerize leg press machine compare uninvolved side 4 . Able read understand English language . 5 . Read , comprehend , sign inform consent procedure . 1 . Subjects pregnant 2 . Subjects medical history hemophilia clot disorder blood 3 . Subjects currently take blood thinner ( e.g . lovenox , Coumadin ) 4 . Subjects neuropathy low extremity 5 . Subjects history metastatic disease 6 . Subjects uncontrolled hypertension 7 . Subjects unable perform strength test due nature injury 8 . Subjects recent history ( within past 4 week ) low extremity surgery . 9 . Subjects compromise skin integrity . ( e.g . open wound , diabetic ulcer , laceration , abrasion ) 10 . Subjects sign infection include skin infection low limb .
